title: Woodland Hunter
description: A master of the wild, you have honed your skills in navigating forests and hunting with precision.

title: Street Brawler
description: You've learned to survive on the streets using your fists and brute strength. No one dares to mess with you.

title: Erudite Spy
description: With a sharp mind and a knack for deceit, you gather information and manipulate others with ease.

title: Market Trader
description: You have a keen eye for business and know how to negotiate the best deals, making you a formidable presence in the market.

title: Industrial Foreman
description: You've managed work crews and kept large projects on track, blending practical skills with leadership.

title: Highwayman
description: A rogue of the roads, you use stealth and force to take what you need from unsuspecting travelers.

title: Field Medic
description: You have honed your skills in the field, using basic alchemy and practical knowledge to patch up the wounded.

title: Town Tailor
description: With a needle and thread, you transform fabric into garments, serving the practical and stylish needs of your community.

title: Rugged Explorer
description: Venturing far from civilization, you survive on your wits and an iron will, conquering the harshest landscapes.

title: Stealthy Cutpurse
description: Quick with your hands and silent as a shadow, you make your living by relieving others of their valuables.

title: Sly Merchant
description: Not all trades are honest, but you make sure they’re profitable. A little cunning goes a long way in business.

title: Armorsmith
description: Crafting armor is your art, and each piece tells a story of protection and craftsmanship.

title: Seafaring Raider
description: You’ve lived a life on the water, using your athletic prowess and combat skills to pillage and plunder.

title: Resourceful Tinker
description: You see opportunity in scrap and discarded items, always able to create something useful from the odds and ends.

title: Crafty Tailor
description: Specializing in bespoke garments, you cater to the elite and discerning with your unique designs.

title: Meticulous Alchemist
description: You dedicate yourself to the delicate art of alchemy, mastering potions and chemical concoctions.

title: Athletic Competitor
description: You’ve spent years training your body, honing your athletic prowess for sport or survival.

title: Forgehand
description: Skilled in the art of blacksmithing, you know your way around an anvil and hammer.

title: Woodsman
description: A true master of woodcraft, you navigate the forest effortlessly and build shelters with ease.

title: Marksman
description: A skilled archer, you hit your targets with unerring accuracy.

title: Street Tough
description: You’re no stranger to physical confrontations; you excel in using brute force to solve problems.

title: Carpenter
description: Skilled in the construction of homes, ships, and more, your expertise with wood and tools is unmatched.

title: Duelist
description: Fast, precise, and deadly with a blade, you thrive in close combat.

title: Scholar
description: A keen mind and a thirst for knowledge drive you to study and learn everything you can.

title: Gunslinger
description: Fast on the draw and accurate under pressure, you are a deadly shot with any firearm.

title: Ranger
description: A true survivalist, you are adept at navigating and thriving in the untamed wilds.

title: Master Metallurgist
description: You have mastered the secrets of metal, turning raw ore into strong and valuable materials.

title: Boxer
description: You fight with your fists and rely on your skill and strength to win the day.

title: Shadow Thief
description: Skilled in moving unseen, you slip into places you shouldn’t be and take what isn’t yours.

title: Seamstress
description: With every stitch, you create something beautiful or practical, serving clients from all walks of life.
